scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend/api-gateway && npm install --prefix backend/user-service && npm install --prefix backend/venue-service && npm install --prefix backend/booking-service && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix backend/api-gateway" "npm start --prefix backend/user-service" "npm start --prefix backend/venue-service" "npm start --prefix backend/booking-service" "npm start --prefix frontend"
